LanguageData.AssemblingRequiresResearch: Using Archite Potion to merge souls requires the {0_label} research project.

LanguageData.GeneWillBeRandomChosen: For each individual, one of the following souls will be randomly chosen as the dominant soul.

LanguageData.ArchitesRequiredDesc: A miraculous potion, extremely rare, can fuse with the Archite Soul Stone to create a powerful soul.
